TopicTitle: All Kerbal Long [Parody of all nightmare long] - 40% finished

Articles.Content:
Soundtracks by Metallica "All Nightmare Long" - THIS IS A PARODY OF THE MUSIC VIDEO

The original video is about spores found in Tunguska and soviet scientists are using it to take over USA. Basic.

my version is about a crashed meteor on KCCP territory, Soviet kerbals send Jebediag to see what happened and strange things happens.

Its my first video on Vegas pro 12.
